short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension simplifies choosing classes for UC Santa Barbara students through data aggregation, visualizations, and chatbot.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension simplifies the class choosing process for UC Santa Barbara students.  It does this by sourcing external data from rate my professors and UCSB's public grade distribution data, and displaying these information in the form of charts and statistics.  If users wanted more information, for example, they could click on hyperlinks that will lead to the professors RMP page.   It also features a chatbot to help advise students in picking classes.  This chatbot provides general information about courses and professors, as well as the ability to recommend classes based on the user's current progress.

This extension is not officially affiliated with UCSB.
